resources.string: <-- Click here to learn how to play Lorekeeper APPRPG!

In order to play Lorekeeper, this app alone is not enough! You\'d also need the following:

  • At least four six-sided dice, preferably four dice per person playing.
  • From one to four other friends, all with this application installed in their smartphone. One of you would be the Lorekeeper, and the others would be the adventurers
  • Pen, paper and props are optional, but greatly improves how Lorekeeper is played.

Hello, World!

This is a test! Lorem ipsum.
